forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. SSE winds shifting to N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 43F. SSE winds shifting to N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
